archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Re-establish Party Relationship
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Re-establish a relationship with a party which was suspended or terminated in the past. This process recovers the appropriate party information along with past interactions and provides them to the operational systems in order to provide continuity in the Party Relationship Management processes.

properties.value: Re-establish Party Relationship re-establishes a relationship with a party which was suspended or terminated in the past. It recovers the appropriate party information along with past interactions and provides them to the operational systems in order to provide continuity in the Party Relationship Management processes.
